text:
Installed on windows 2003 server enterprise SP2 Japanese OS (i.e., OS is the native Japanese version).
Installs fine. However, pages not rendered even for http://localhost:8080 and just timeout.
Looks like someone else also had this issue on a non-native Japanese system when configured with Japanese code pages. See url for those details.
creator: bsgcic1776@acite.com

text:
Some of the log file contents:

Translations of Japanese error messages added in brackets following the Japanese text:
